meanings.definition: Not receiving a salary or wages.
meanings.sent1: She chose an unsalaried internship to gain experience.
meanings.sent2: The volunteer work was unsalaried but rewarding.
meanings.sent3: The unsalaried position allowed her to follow her passion.
meanings.sent4: His unsalaried efforts contributed greatly to the community.
meanings.sent5: The unsalaried job offered valuable skills for her future.

meanings.definition: Not paid a salary or wages.
meanings.sent1: The unsalaried workers relied on tips for income.
meanings.sent2: Many artists start out with unsalaried gigs.
meanings.sent3: The unsalaried role in the play was a comedic relief.
meanings.sent4: Her unsalaried status didn't diminish her dedication.
meanings.sent5: The unsalaried position required creativity to make ends meet.
